title: Our 2020 Flu Shot Extravaganza
description:
Gather the family around, it's time for our annual celebration of the flu shot! We got you the PERFECT gift: A bunch of answers to your flu shot quandries, especially in the age of COVID-19. C'mon, the party's starting!

More Information: The Immunization Action Coalition

Music: "Medicines" by The Taxpayers
author: sawbones@maximumfun.org (Justin McElroy)
